title: "?" "?" "?" "?" "?" "?" the entire game, reportable?
body:
hi guys, is spamming missing pings actually bannable? 
I know I should mute people for that, sure, I'm doing that all the time but im just wondering.
Just had a guy spam "?" at me the entire game i think, muted him early on.

replies.body: You can report it for sure but if that is the only toxic thing they do they will not be punished for it.  I generally expect people who do that to be toxic though so reporting them will flag their account for the future when they do actually do something that leads to punishment.
I've seen a case on these boards of people being punished for ping spam, but that was also in conjunction of trolling.
I dont think it is , id just mute pings and move on with your life. Those people arent worth you being upset <3

Yes, it is reportable. But, I believe that it is currently not punishable.

I report it to help teach the IFS that it's annoying. If it gets reported consistently enough, it should result in a change to the system.

o.O

This is a bad thing.
I don't think I've ever seen someone get punished for pings in all the years I've been on these boards so I assume no
Put your big boy pants on and mute pings. It's not reportable, nor is it punishable.
